text: Henry George Steinbrenner III (April 2, 1957 â€“ April 14, 2020) was an American businessman. He was the part-owner and co-chairman of the New York Yankees of Major League Baseball. He was the older brother of the team's principal owner and managing general partner Hal Steinbrenner. His parents were George Steinbrenner and Joan Steinbrenner. He was born in Culver, Indiana. Steinbrenner died on April 14, 2020 in Clearwater, Florida of liver disease- related problems, aged 63. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2020 deaths Category:New York Yankees Category:Businesspeople from Indiana Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Deaths from liver disease Category:Disease-related deaths in Florida
title: Hank Steinbrenner
